id: DPDPA Rules/Notice by Data Fiduciary to Data Principal
title: Rule 3: Notice by Data Fiduciary to Data Principal
description: Rule 3 requires every Data Fiduciary to provide a clear and accessible notice to the Data Principal before processing personal data. The notice must be a separate and easily understandable document, and not hidden within lengthy terms and conditions.
